Adamantine Ammunition.Note: Add ammunition cost for a 'quiver' of them in Armor Cost column (Arrows = 20, Bolts = 20, Firearm Bullets = 10, Sling Bullets = 10, Needles = 50)

Adamantine Arrows (20).Note: Cost is for 1 quiver of 20 arrows

Adamantine Weapon.Note: Add weapon cost in Armor Cost column, added cantrip for magic weapon property

Armor of Gleaming.Note: add armor to total; based: prestidigitation

Armor of Resistance.Note: Add armor cost for total; based: protection from energy (plus 1 level, no concentration)

Armor of Resistance, Leather.Note: based: protection from energy (plus 1 level, no concentration)

Armor of Resistance, Chain Shirt.Note: based: protection from energy (plus 1 level, no concentration)

Armor of Resistance, Breastplate.Note: based: protection from energy (plus 1 level, no concentration)

Armor of Resistance, Plate.Note: based: protection from energy (plus 1 level, no concentration)

Armor of Vulnerability.Note: Cursed, not priced (would be the same as Armor of Resistance)

Bag of Tricks.Note: based: conjure animals (plus 1 level, no concentraiton, highest level monster is CR 2)

Bead of Force.Note: based: resilient sphere (plus 1 level, no concentration), add charges per bead

Belt of Dwarvenkind.Note: not included: advantage on CHA, dwarven language

Boots of the Winterlands.Note: based: freedom of movement minus 2 levels

Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals.Note: based: conjure elemental (plus 1 level, no cocentration)

Carpet of Flying, 6x9.Note: based: fly, 4 creatures (plus 1 level, no concentration)

Cloak of Arachnida.Note: based: spider climb (plus 1 level, no concentration), web

Cloak of Invisibility.Note: based: greater invisibility (plus 1 level, no concentration), 2 hours = effective permanent

Cubic Gate.Note: based: gate & planeshift (charges based on highest level spell)

Deck of Illusions.Note: based: major image, add charges based on cards

Energy Bow.Note: based: misty step (plus 2 levels, increased range and affect others), spider climb

Horn of Blasting.Note: while it is consumable, it has (likely) multiple uses

Rod of Alertness.Note: based: enhance ability, similar auras at paladin 7th level, about 4th level spell power

Rod of Lordly Might.Note: based on flame tongue; misc is frightened

Rod of the Pact Keeper, +3.Note: Spell Save DC = AC bonus, spell attack = weapon bonus, regain spell slot treated as Lv1

Staff of Thunder and Lightning.Note: based: lightning bolt (plus 1 level), thunderclap based on 1st level
